title: [Large-Scale] Participatory Scenario-Based Training for Strengthening Humanitarian Logistics Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Logistics Processes and Awareness of Humanitarian Assistance Concepts
context.additional_context: Learners use digital devices (laptops/tablets) and participate in crisis response simulations based on real NGO field cases

learning_goals: Learners can apply and perform the five-stage logistics process (needs assessment, resource allocation, transportation, storage, and monitoring) in scenario-based simulations during disasters.
Through team collaboration, learners can propose three or more conflict-resolution strategies among stakeholders when establishing humanitarian logistics plans.
Learners can analyze logistics operations in real-time and generate reports using digital tools (such as online collaboration platforms).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
